channel.title: Andrew Stanton on jverkamp.com
channel.description: Recent content in Andrew Stanton on jverkamp.com

item.title: Finding Nemo
item.description: Finding Nemo is a delightful children’s movie. It’s the story of a worrying dad (Marlin), a son (Nemo) trying to grow into his own self, the trouble that causes, and the lengths family can go through for one another.

item.title: John Carter
item.description: Another year (more or less), another year of movies. I realy like going to the movies, it’s a nice distraction from the grin of PhD work. And what’s better, being a grad student leaves my schedule flexible enough so that I can go to the weekday matinees for a mere $5 ticket. Not too bad for ~2 hours of entertainment.
